pullrequest.title: Change the queue message such that it alerts the user if segway is running locally (whether this is intentional or because DRMAA was installed incorrectly).

content.raw:
Both strings share the same same end string `%s: %s (%s)" % (res, jobname, res_req)` and both `print >>sys.stderr`. "running locally" and "queued" should be the only strings to consider in the conditional. Something like 


```
#!python

job_location = "queued"
if DRIVER_NAME_OVERRIDE == "local":
     job_location = "running locally"
```
